refnamediv.refpurpose: Link an object to another one

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: h5ln(obj, linkname, destobj [, hard]) h5ln(obj, linkname, destname [, hard]) h5ln(obj, linkname, destfile, destname) h5ln(filename, location, linkname, destname [, hard]) h5ln(filename, location, linkname, destfile, destname)

listitem.para: a string giving the link name
a string giving the destination filename
a string giving the location in the file

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Create a hard, soft or external link. When destfile is given, it is always an external link. By default hard is set to false, so by default a soft link is created.
Soft links can be created even if the target does not exist.
